D

dbAddress - Variable in class pengu.database.PenguAccessDBCommunicator
Stores the address of the database file.
DBSetup - Class in pengu.database
This class stores constants that store configuration data about the user database file.

DBSetup.Tables - Class in pengu.database
This class stores the database table names

decryptMessage(String) - Method in class pengusecurity.encrypt.PenguKeyPair
Decrypts an inputed Base64 encoded and encrypted String using RSA.
decryptMessageString(String) - Method in class pengusecurity.encrypt.PenguAESEncryption
Decrypts an inputed Base64 encoded and encrypted String.
deleteActiveChat(int) - Method in class pengu.database.MessageDBCommunicator
Deletes the specified chat from the active chats table.
deleteActiveChat(int) - Method in class pengu.messenger.PenguMessengerClient
Deletes the specified active chat from the database, and all messages in the chat.
deleteContact(int) - Method in class pengu.database.ContactsDBCommunicator
Deletes the user from the contact list table.

Deletes a specified contact from the database.
deleteContactType(int) - Method in class pengu.database.ContactsDBCommunicator
Deletes the specified contact group.
deleteMessageInboxReference(int) - Method in class pengu.database.MessageDBCommunicator
Deletes a In-box/Message Reference from the In-box table as it has been downloaded from the server.
deleteReceivedMessage(int) - Method in class pengu.database.MessageDBCommunicator
Deletes a Received Message From the database.
deleteReceivedMessage(int) - Method in class pengu.messenger.PenguMessengerClient
Deletes a specified message from the received messages database.
deleteSentMessage(int) - Method in class pengu.database.MessageDBCommunicator
Deletes a Sent Message From the database.
deleteSentMessage(int) - Method in class pengu.messenger.PenguMessengerClient
Deletes a specified message from the sent messages database.
DELIMITER - Static variable in class pengusecurity.encrypt.PenguEncryptedMessage
Stores the delimiter constant, that is used to separate a RSA public key hash, a RSA encrypted AES key, and a AES encrypted Message.
